meanings.definition: A member of a Muslim religious order who has taken vows of poverty and austerity.
meanings.sent1: The dervishes gathered to pray together in their humble mosque.
meanings.sent2: The dervishes in the village were known for their simple way of life.
meanings.sent3: The dervishes decided to have a potluck dinner to celebrate their vow of poverty.
meanings.sent4: The dervishes' dedication to their vows shone brightly in their daily actions.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the dervishes walking barefoot left a lasting impression on the villagers.

meanings.definition: A whirling dance performed by members of a Muslim religious order.
meanings.sent1: The dervishes twirled gracefully to the rhythm of the music.
meanings.sent2: Visitors were mesmerized by the dervishes' hypnotic spinning dance.
meanings.sent3: The dervishes' whirling dance accidentally knocked over a vase during practice.
meanings.sent4: The dervishes' spinning resembled a whirlwind of colors on the stage.
meanings.sent5: The audience was captivated by the dervishes' enchanting performance.
